effectsNote:
The multipliers for this attack is given by the following formulas, where X is the current HP% of the user:

Six hits: min(exp(-1*(X-1)*600/10000)*20+90, 110) / 100

Single hit follow-up: min(exp(-1*(X-1)*600/10000)*65+295, 360) / 100

For the six hits, the minimum multiplier is 0.90, and never goes higher than 1.10.

For the single hit follow-up, the minimum multiplier is 2.95, and never goes higher than 3.60.
